442820.name: Talisman: The Horus Heresy Soundtrack
442820.description:
The official soundtrack for Talisman: The Horus Heresy, composed by Mattias Westlund.

Included tracks -

  • Ascend - 4:17
  • Balance of Power - 3:05
  • Heretic's Rule - 3:12
  • Immaterium - 2:14
  • Imperium Aeternus - 3:38
  • Shadows On The Fringe - 3:52
  • Strength In Numbers - 2:54
  • Terminus - 2:39
  • Unconquered - 4:13
  • Void Between The Stars - 2:32

All tracks are in mp3 format, 320kbps. FLAC versions are included too and are downloaded to the 'Flacs' folder.

Hear more of Mattias' music on his Soundcloud page -
